title: cygan
author: cygan
content: on the youtube channel of bloomberg originals, an almost 2-hour documentary on the incidents at FTX was released today.exciting backgrounds and voices to said docu. there is for the first time only in english language - hopefully more languages will follow...QuoteRUIN is a feature documentary about Sam Bankman-Fried and the stunning collapse of his cryptocurrency exchange, FTX, as narrated by Bloomberg journalists and some of the central players in the rise of digital assets.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3QpdU9LS540
